name: Devil In My House
storyline:
Devil in my house is a horror game in which you play the role of Lucas, who is called up for military service and finds out about the disappearance of his wife Ashley.
After receiving this information, he is immediately released and decides to find out what happened.
But as it turns out, his house is no longer his home...
summary: Shortly after Lucas leaves, he learns that his wife Ashley is missing. After receiving this information, he returns home to investigate and find out what happened at home.
